column4: does anyone know how I can actually get apt to work properly with a Password authenticated proxy?
I have looked on the web
is 'export http_proxy=http://username:password@proxyserver.net:port/' not working?  Or have you tried using apt.conf?
I can't remember, I will try it again
where do I put that line?
yes, that will be enough to test it in that shell
if that command worked, you'll need to make it permanent
I don't know yet I have a direct connection as well for now I will need to wait until that is blocked until i test It won't I?

oh, ok.  Note taht if you use the gui (system -> preferences -> network proxy  and use "details" to fill in password info), it should work, but you may need to reboot for the settings to take affect in your terminals.
oops, should have said (Forgot), i am using KDE
the odd thing is thatsome repos work, others don't
hmm, there might be some gui there too, but idk
